about_the_game:
Set in a dystopian America in the not-so distant future. CORRUPTION 2029 is a turn based tactical combat game from The Bearded Ladies, creators of ‘Mutant Year Zero: Road to Eden’ and Miasma Chronicles.

Using your supreme tactical abilities, command a squad of heavily augmented ‘units’ deep into enemy territory to discover the cause of the CORRUPTION.

CORRUPTION 2029 is a hardcore tactical game that should test the mettle of even the most experienced tactical gamers.

FIERCE TURN BASED COMBAT

Engaging in tactical combat is a formidable challenge that requires exceptional strategic planning for victory. You must lead your squad of four units across the battlefield, mastering the art of tactical positioning, effective cover utilisation, and maintaining a clear Line of Sight. Employ a range of explosives or specialised weaponry to obliterate enemy defences, and leverage powerful tactical implants to gain a decisive advantage.

SILENT STEALTH OR LOUD AND DESTRUCTIVE

Approach stealthily, devise a flawless trap, and take out unsuspecting enemy forces with your silent armaments, shifting the odds in your favour. Alternatively, grab your most powerful Gatling guns and grenades, unleashing a storm of firepower—it's entirely up to you.

EXPLORE A NEW AMERICA

The United States is fractured by civil war, split between the Free Alliance and the oppressive New American Council, who have been engaged in a brutal struggle for dominance for years. As the balance of power shifts, the NAC faces catastrophic defeats, and intelligence suggests they are on the verge of creating a desperate weapon of terror. What exactly are they constructing? What lies behind the CORRUPTION?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 (2 * 3600) or equivalent OR AMD FX-4300 (4 * 3800) or equivalent
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 (2048 MB) OR Radeon HD 7850 (2048 MB)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4771 (4 * 3500) or equivalent OR AMD FX-9370 (8 * 4400) or equivalent
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (4096 MB) OR Radeon RX Vega 56 (8192 MB)
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: From the creators of Mutant Year Zero comes an intense and Hardcore Turn-Based Tactical Game. Command your squad of four units and venture into a war torn America, where every turn counts in fierce tactical battles. Designed for those who crave a serious challenge, not for the faint-hearted!
